submit your quotes!

summary:
Andi: So what, you're just never going to bring it up?
Buffy: I will, on my deathbed. I'm going to get the last word in, then...
body:
Andi: So what, you’re just never going to bring it up?

Buffy: I will, on my deathbed. I’m going to get the last word in, then die.

Buffy: I have 77 arguments I’m going to win that way.

Andi: That’s insane!

Buffy: Now it’s 78.

reblog.comment:

body:
50 days of Andi Mack

Season 1 Episode 6: She Said She Said

  • “Hey Cyrus, someone wants you over there” “Who?” “Me” Ok Buffy, that was too far
  • Cyrus calling Jonah a HUMAN SUNBEAM!!
  • I didn’t realise that Buffy said “You’d know if you knew me” twice to Marty, that’s nice touch
  • She remembered him as the guy who lied about eating a frog? Really???
  • Marty… FrOm thE ParTyyyyy
  • I’m not a Jonah Beck super fan or anything, but seeing him upset is actually heartbreaking
  • “I live for the day you tell me you’re proud of me” These Bex and Cece scenes are getting to me
  • Andi’s deer jumper is… really something
  • How exactly does Andi running to Jonah prove she likes him? Maybe she was running late and wanted to get there as quickly as possible so she could get home quicker??
  • I got so much second hand embarrassment when Andi tripped trying to make a dramatic exit
  • The scene where Bex did Cece’s makeup was so sweet!
  • Bowie and Andi saying “whoa” and laughing at the same time was just perfect

reblog.comment:

blog.name: nick-schedule-archive-reboot
blog.title: Nickelodeon Schedule Archive II
blog.description: Hi! I am the current Nickelodeon Schedule Archive. I do Nick schedules weekly and other channels rarely. I am also Zadore™, a YouTube channel created by me. This month, June 2019, I'm starting a break for myself from schedules until either August or September. THere will still be a little bit of info about premieres or listings, but more on other stuff than scheds this summer. I will pine for Gumball and Andi when they both end, welcome Mao Mao when it comes out, celebrate Catscratch's 14th anniversary, Wubbzy's 13th anniversary, and more comming this summer, right here on the Nickelodeon Schedule Archive Reboot, or Nickelodeon Schedule Archive Two!

summary: Those pics make me want an Andi Mack Takes Toronto DCOM just because I want to confirm Bex as a huge Degrassi fan who wants to...
question: Those pics make me want an Andi Mack Takes Toronto DCOM just because I want to confirm Bex as a huge Degrassi fan who wants to mourn it's unannounced death
answer:
in the crossover event of the century: bex mack and manny santos battle it out for bowie’s love but ultimately leave him and get married to each other instead

meanwhile andi attends summer school and discovers that she’s actually a princess with super human powers or some shit like that

summary: If the show didn't focus on Andi or had Andi as the main character which character would you have liked to see become the main...
question: If the show didn't focus on Andi or had Andi as the main character which character would you have liked to see become the main character instead?
answer:
I’m really not sure if I would have been as interested in the same show told from a different perspective. I think that the story of Andi’s family is too important to be moved to a background plot, as it would have been if she were not the main character. 

I know a lot of people talk about wishing the show were more Cyrus-centered, or the concept of a Cyrus-centered spin-off, but I have never has much interest in that concept. There is an underappreciated art to telling stories through subtext and background moments, and Cyrus’ storyline is one of the greatest examples of that I have ever seen in doing that. By moving him to the forefront of the show, the way his story has been told would have had to change and I’m not sure it would have been as well-done or if it would have had the same impact. 

Don’t get me wrong - I would have loved to see more of all of the characters. Jonah. Amber. Buffy. TJ. Cyrus. They all have their own separate home lives that would have been incredible to see more of, but I just don’t think I would have preferred any of them over the story we got with Andi.

reblog.comment:

summary: I have this urge to edit a video of the GHC+Jonah to Dove Cameron’s “Count Me In”.
body: I have this urge to edit a video of the GHC+Jonah to Dove Cameron’s “Count Me In”.
